name: HOVA Flight Services
about: HOVA Flight Services, located at Hanover County Municipal Airport in Ashland, Virginia, has been a cornerstone of aviation services since 1992. As a full-service Fixed Base Operator (FBO), HOVA offers a wide range of amenities including fuel, line services, hangared aircraft storage, transient parking, and comprehensive aircraft maintenance. The facility boasts a newly constructed 7,000 sq. ft. private terminal with spacious lobby seating, a large conference room, kitchen facilities, and Wi-Fi. HOVA also provides concierge services such as travel assistance, crew cars, and baggage help. The flight school at HOVA offers top-notch flight training in a supportive and fun environment, catering to both recreational and professional pilots. With its convenient location near Richmond and easy access to I-95 and I-295, HOVA Flight Services is the preferred choice for pilots and visitors, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable aviation experience.
